description: Last week, three senior directors left Pace Gallery and David Zwirner finalized the reorganization of its digital team.
title: The Big Galleries and Auction Houses Are Rethinking Their Workforces

description: In permanent collections and temporary exhibits, a gradual decolonization of art is giving ownership back to Native artists around the world.
title: Where to See Art Created and Curated Through an Indigenous Lens

description: The Michelin ceremony honored 10 California restaurants with newly-awarded stars, and another 10 with Bib Gourmand recognition.
title: These 4 Los Angeles Restaurants Just Earned New Michelin Stars

description: The 1993 Biennial was one of the most criticized, inspiring massive public debate; this year's edition is more subdued but no less impactful.
title: A Look at the 2024 Whitney Biennial Through the Lens of the 1993 Edition

description: We spoke with Finn about how her vision for the fair has evolved and the changing role of Art Basel Miami Beach in the larger cultural ecosystem of Miami Art Week.
title: A Nexus Between the Americas: Bridget Finn On Her First Art Basel Miami Beach

description: From a classic cotton sundress and timeless one-piece to the most splurge-worthy pair of sandals and a nautical striped sweater these are the best pieces to pack for a beach weekend that we're loving and coveting right now.
title: Jet Set: The Beach Weekend Packing Guide
